message.subject: QE2
message.content:
M1.1. I have tentatively booked us on the QE2 sailing from Southampton at 5pm on August 29, arriving New York at 7:30am on September 4.
[Inform: Mark tentatively booked places for Linda and him on QE2]
M1.2. You and Amanda have a Caronia class cabin at $2045.32 per person, including air from New York to London (with a business class upgrade on Continental).
[Inform: cost of cabin for Linda and Amanda, including airfare]
M1.3. I have a single in the same class (so we eat in the same restaurant).
[Inform: Mark has a room in same class as Linda and Amanda, so they will eat in the same restaurant]
M1.4. My plan would be to fly over on Sunday evening - the 26th - since I have to be in Ohio that morning.
[Inform: when Mark plans to fly to London]
M1.5. With that in mind I have also booked jr. suites for us at "41" the all-inclusive London hotel near Buckingham Palace that I've mentioned to you before.
[Inform: Mark booked suites at a hotel in London]
M1.6. They are at 275 GBP per night (2 nights).
[Inform: nightly cost of suites]
M1.7. Of course, if you guys wanted to go earlier to spend more time in London, I am sure that would be possible.
[Inform: it is ok if Linda and Amanda want to arrive in London earlier than Mark]
M1.8. The difficulty is that Amanda has indicated an interest in staying in Europe longer - certainly understandable.
[Inform: Amanda wants to stay in Europe longer]
M1.9. Her preference would be to go over on the boat leaving NY on September 5, arriving in Southampton Sept. 10 and then stay in Europe for a few weeks.
[Inform: Amanda wants to take the return boat ride, from New York to London]
Sflink1.9
M1.10. That doesn't work quite as well for me because I only have 6 vacation days left and on that routing I get one less day in London - i.e. we get off the boat on Monday morning and I have to fly back Tuesday morning.
[Inform: Mark doesn't like this plan as much]
M1.11. On the other hand, we wouldn't be jet lagged on arrival in London!
[Inform: the plus side is that they will not be jet-lagged when they get to London]
M1.12. They will hold the reservation until tomorrow.
[Inform: reservation held until tomorrow]
M1.13. What's your preference?
[Request-Information: Linda's preference]
Flink1.13

message.subject: QE2
message.content:
M2.1. What kind of a fool do you think I am.
[Inform: joke about Mark thinking Linda is a fool]
M2.2. No way I am getting in the middle of you and Amanda on vacation plans.
[Inform: joke about not wanting to get between Mark and Amanda on their vacation plans]
Blink1.9
M2.3. I'll just pack my little bag and wait at the dock until you two show up.
[Inform: joke about Linda packing her bag and waiting for Mark and Amanda to show up]
M2.4. I will however give you both a credit card number - it is 5410 6584 0536 6574 exp 11/01
[Inform: Linda's credit card number]
Sflink2.4

message.subject: QE2
message.content:
M3.1. Your reservations went through on the card you wanted.
[Inform: Linda's reservations went through on her credit card]
Blink2.4
M3.2. I asked for 9/12 as your return date and 9/26 as Amanda's.
[Inform: different return dates requested for Linda and Amanda]
